message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I have a budget to stick to.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  However,  the value of this product is significant, and $14,000 is below its true worth. Would you consider meeting me halfway at $17,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $15,000, but that's as high as I can go.
